evidence.claim: Healthrise utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure to host applications securely.
Healthrise complies with HIPAA and uses FHIR for health data exchange.
The company integrates with EHRs using HL7 standards for data interoperability.
Healthrise supports X12 transaction sets for healthcare claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Healthrise uses X12 for EDI transactions, fitting the API-first healthcare focus.
